means: 压缩，压紧，使收缩( constrict的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Many of the women I spoke to left because they felt constricted.
sentence.Network_cn: 和我聊过的很多女性因为觉得受拘束离开了。

sentence.Network_en: My throat constricted, so that I had to concentrate on breathing.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的嗓子发紧，所以我不得不把注意力集中在呼吸上。

sentence.Network_en: His throat began to feel swollen and constricted.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始觉得喉咙肿胀发紧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... *consume v. 消费，消耗 *constricted adj. 收缩的 contrast n./v. 对比.

list.abs: constriction 狭窄constriction experiment 结扎实验construction 组成
wellhead connector 井口连接器wellhead constriction 井口油嘴wellhead crude oil sample 井口油样
含铜太少会限制电流流动,因而产生集中电阻(constriction resistance)。尺寸合适的铜迹线可以降低体电阻、降低温度并减小损耗。否则,热量可能“下沉”到连接器的接口.
·收缩因子(constriction factor)的引入第32页 　　·粒子群优化算法种群拓扑结构研究第32-36页 　　　　·代数式的变化第32-33页 　　　　.

entry.tran: (使)(身体部位，尤指喉咙)收紧，收缩
entry.def: If a part of your body, especially your throat, is constricted or if it constricts, something causes it to become narrower.

example.ex: Severe migraine can be treated with a drug which constricts the blood vessels...
example.tran: 严重的偏头疼可以用一种收缩血管的药物进行治疗。

example.ex: My throat constricted, so that I had to concentrate on breathing.
example.tran: 我的嗓子发紧，所以我不得不把注意力集中在呼吸上。

entry.def: If something constricts you, it limits your actions so that you cannot do what you want to do.

example.ex: She objects to the tests the Government's advisers have devised because they constrict her teaching style...
example.tran: 她反对政府顾问设计的考试，因为这些考试限制了她的教学风格。

example.ex: Men and women alike have been constricted by traditional sexual roles.
example.tran: 男性和女性同样受到传统性别角色的束缚。

means.word_mean: 1. especially tense; especially in some dialects
2. drawn together or squeezed physically or by extension psychologically;

sentences.sentence: "when modern man feels socially constricted his first impulse is to move"
